The steam crack seems to be bugged a little: every time you reload and dock to a station you get all the achievements again.
And for every achievement there is a money reward.
So reload game => get extra money. Kinda bad for game balance :-)

Thanks for the release though. Gives a chance to play a game before buying it, to see if it is actually good.
